lines: naee subah se pahale
vah paanch the kul ek mahila aur chaar purush
prem unhen lekar bas staind se jab ghar aaya to veena pichhale kamare kee khidakee ke paas khadee unhen dekh rahee thee
kaun hoga inamen se sabhee sundar hain
man hee man socha veena ne
dekh rahee thee do bhare hue badan ke the
ek bilkul dubalaapatala tha ek madhyam aakaar ka
kad sabhee ka chhah phut ke aasapaas tha
kaun sa ho sakata hai suneeta kab se aa khadee thee usake peechhe veena ko pata bhee na chala tha
chutakeelee usane veena kee tabhee maaloom pada aur vah laja gaee jaise usakee choree pakadee gaee ho
suneeta do varsh badee thee veena se
donon ek doosare kee hamaraaj theen
iseelie usake man kee baat samajh kar bolee  sab ek jaise hain
koee bhee ho theek hai
haan vah neele kot vaala sabase achchha hai
ho sakata hai
veena ne kaha
achchha hai lekin mujhe to vah dubalaapatala lagata hai tumhaara ummeedavaar
suneeta ne phir usakee chutakee lete hue kaha ab taiyaar ho jao jaldee se
abhee bheetar jaana hoga tumhen apana parichay dene
haan ho jaatee hoon
kaun sa abhee jaana hai
din bhar ka prograam hoga unaka
dillee se aae hain
thoda aaraam karenge
khaana khaenge
tab jaakar mera nambar aaega
veena apanee kalpana mein doobee kah rahee thee
khush ho gaee thee aane vaalon kee sooraten dekhakar
pahale ek kone mein man ke dar tha ki vigyaapanon ke maadhyam se hone vaale rishte sunane mein kuchh aur aur dikhane mein kuchh aur lagate hain
inhen dekhakar hee vah aashvast ho gaee ki jaisa socha tha vaise hee lag rahe hain
neele kot vaala hee hoga dev doktar dev kumaar
man ne jaise usake nirnay de diya
lagabhag paanch minat baad kamare mein rajanee ne pravesh kiya aur bolee are veena vo neele kot vaala hai dev
baakee do usake bhaee hain aur ek dost
aur vah aurat usakee bhaabhee hai
bahut utsaahit thee vah
shaayad sabase pahale usaka hee parichay hua ho jaise
phir kuchh thaharakar bolee chal taiyaar ho ja
mammee kah rahee hai chaay tumhen hee le jaanee hai bheetar
tabhee kamare mein geeta bhee aa gaee
sabase chhotee bahan geeta laadalee ghar kee
aksar aadhunik paridhaan mein rahane vaalee
baal bhee chhotechhote
aate hee bolee bade maje aae deedee
main paanee lekar gaee to unamen kuchh khusaraphusar huee
shaayad samajh rahe hain ki tum bhee mere jaisee hogee
maje aaenge deedee yadi tum bhee jeens pahanakar unake saamane jao
chalahat main apana majaak nahin banava sakatee
ab too baahar ja aur unakee seva kar
mujhe taiyaar hone de
veena ko sabakee baaten bahut achchhee lag rahee theen
lekin manachaahee khushee paakar vah chahak nahin pa rahee thee bas sharm se laal hue ja rahee thee
sabake saamane jaane mein use badee sharm aa rahee thee
apanee sharm apanee khushee chhipaane ka prayatn karate hue usane geeta ko baahar bhagaana chaaha
lekin geeta bhee bhala kahaan yoon hee jaane vaalee thee bolee vaah deedee
abhee se
abhee to baat bhee nahin huee to itana dhyaan baad mein kya hoga aur phir geeta vahaan rukee nahin kyonki jaanatee thee rukee to deedee kaan kheenchegee
bhaag gaee rasoee ghar kee or jahaan mehamaanon ke lie chaay taiyaar ho rahee thee
dillee se aae the dev dev ke bade bhaee kamaandar ramesh kumaar unakee patnee maalatee mitr pramod va chhota bhaee amit
draeeng room mein sabhee baithe isee vyagrata se bheetar se aane vaale ko dekhe ja rahe the ki shaayad veena hee aa rahee hai
lekin kabhee rajanee aatee thee jisaka parichay prem ke baad unase hua tha
geeta ne to apana parichay svayan de diya tha
paanee lekar bheetar aaee tab ve sab log draeeng room mein akele the
prem mammee ke paas rasoee mein chala gaya tha
usee ne abhivaadan karane ke saath hee svayan bata diya ki vah sabase chhotee hai ghar mein
geeta hai naam usaka beeesasee ke pahale saal mein padh rahee hai
geeta ne mahasoos kiya ki aagantukon mein se ek ne us dubale ladake kee taraph muskura kar dekha tha
geeta ka parichay jaanakar
geeta ko bhee ramesh ne sabaka parichay diya
prem lautakar kamare mein jab vaapis aaya tab geeta bheetar bhaagee sabako khabar dene
ghar bhar mein chahalapahal machee huee thee
pannaalaal abhee ghar nahin pahunche the
baajaar gae the
mehamaanon ke lie kuchh khaanepeene ka saamaan lene
nirmala ko unheen ke aane kee prateeksha thee
ladakee ke rishte ke lie aae logon ko dekhakar usake pairon mein uthalaputhal mach jaatee thee
kuchh kaam nahin kar pa rahee thee
bas badahavaasasee rasoeeghar mein cheejen idharudhar rakhe ja rahee thee
aise mein rajanee aur geeta ne kamaan sanbhaal lee thee aur saath hee pados se thaapa aantee chalee aaee theen
kuchh kaam mein haath bantaane aur kuchh ghar kee khabar lene
yah rita dhoondha tha ramesh kumaar ne
dev to virakt ho chuka tha
shaadee karane kee sochata tha lekin ek dar jo baith gaya tha usake man mein use mahasoos kar vah apanee shaadee kee ichchha ko man mein daba leta tha
ramesh chhuttee par aaya
usee ne pahal kee
dev se khulakar baat kee
tab dev ne apane man kee ulajhan use prakat kar dee
ramesh se kuchh na chhipa tha
vah jaanata tha apane bhaee ke man mein baithe dar ko
yahee bola vah tab  do saal ho gae hain aaaipareshan ko
usake baad tumhen kuchh pareshaanee nahin huee
sehat tumhaaree pahale se achchhee ho gaee hai
achchha khaate ho achchha kamaate ho
rishtedaaree mein log rishta to ab bhee la rahe hain
yah alag baat hai ki ladakee vahee saumpane kee baat karate hain jisamen kuchh na kuchh kamee ho
aise mein kya ve sab nahin sochate ki is ladake ka aaaipareshan hua hai yah bahut beemaar tha
aur aaaipareshan hona koee badee baat nahin ab
ladakee achchhee mile yahee ichchha hai aur iseelie sochata hoon akhabaar mein vigyaapan de diya jae
dev ko sambal mila ramesh kumaar kee baaton se
vah akela nahin hai
koee aur bhee chinta karata hai usakee
man mein baithee prabal ichchha chaahe kaisee bhee ho koee poora karane mein sahayog dene kee baat kahe to vahee sabase achchha lagata hai
tab lagata hai man ko ki duniya mein us vyakti se badhakar usaka koee hitaishee nahin ho sakata
aise mein man kee ichchha aur prabal ho jaatee hai poora hone ko
man sab kapaat band kar deta hai
man aur kuchh sochana band kar deta hai
bas jo socha hai vah poora ho jae
aise mein dev ne yahee kaha  vigyaapan mein aaaipareshan ke baare mein jaroor likhana hai aur ek baar jaakar doktar gupta se jaroor milana chaahie hamen kuchh bhee antim nirnay lene se pahale
is par ramesh ne kaha  vah to main bhee soch raha tha
abhee vigyaapan dete hain aur phir kisee din kuchh tay karane se pahale ham donon jaakar doktar se bhee mil lenge
phir kuchh sochakar bole  aisa karo tum hee vigyaapan ka maitar bana do
main bhej doonga amit ke haath
theek hai bana doonga
amit tum kal hee akhabaar mein de aana
dev ne kaha tab
bas phir kya tha vigyaapan de diya akhabaar mein aur agale hee din doktar gupta se milane donon bhaee unake klinik ja pahunche
do varsh baad dev ko dekhakar doktar gupta bahut khush hue
svaagat hai doktar kapoor bahut achchha laga tumhen dekhakar koee pareshaanee to nahin hai na doktar gupta kya sabhee doktar apane mareej ko ekaek saamane dekhakar yahee prashn karate hain
doktaron ke paas koee svasth vyakti to jaata nahin aur dev se unhen vishesh lagaav bhee ho gaya tha usake ilaaj ke samay
aapake saamane khada hoon
dekh leejie aapane meree kaaya hee palat dee hai  dev ne muskuraate hue doktar gupta se haath milaaya
yah sab tumhaaree apanee vilapaavar se hua hai
jitana vyakti paaaijitiv hota hai utanee hee jaldee theek ho jaata hai
dev kee jeevan ke prati umang se poornatah parichit the doktar gupta
aaaipareshan to vah roj hee karate the lekin dev jaise mareejon se kabheekabhee mulaakaat hotee hai tabhee vah use bilkul nahin bhoole the
doktar gupta tab ramesh kee or haath badhaate hue bole  yadi main galatee nahin kar raha to aap dev ke bade bhaee hain kamaandar ramesh kumaar
jee doktar bahut achchha lag raha hai aap hamen bhoole nahin
na apane mareej ko aur na hee usake parivaar ko  ramesh doktar gupta kee smrti ko dekhakar hataprabh ho gaya tha
dev jaise vyakti kabheekabhee doktar kee jindagee mein aate hain
isaka ilaaj karake mujhe bhee bahut achchha laga
ise theek dekhakar mujhe bhee bahut khushee hotee hai
yah kahakar doktar gupta ne dev se poochha  kaho dev kaise aana hua koee pareshaanee to nahin
nahin doktar main bilkul theek hoon
dev ne kaha aur ramesh kee or dekha
jaise kahana chaah raha ho ki aage baat vahee karen
tab ramesh kumaar ne kaha ham aapakee raay lene aae hain doktar
yaad hai aapane mujhase kaha tha ki aaaipareshan ke ek saal baad koee pareshaanee na huee to dev bilkul hamaare jaisa hee hoga
haanhaan sab yaad hai lekin isamen koee khaas baat hai haan doktar
main aapase raay lena chaahata hoon ki kya hamen dev kee shaadee ke lie kaheen baat chalaanee chaahie  oh to yah baat hai
doktar gupta jaise bheetar hee bheetar kuchh sochane lage
kaheen gahare mein utar kar
lekin oopar se unhonne apanee muskuraahat jaaree rakhee
tab saral bhaav se poochha unhonne kyon koee pasand hai ya kisee ko tum pasand ho baat doktar gupta ne dev ko kahee javaab ramesh ne diya
haan baat chal rahee hai lekin aapakee raay lena jarooree samajhata hoon
bhee isamen meree raay kee kya baat pasand hai jaroor karo
lekin sab baat bataakar
aakhir kuchh to hai jise chhipaana uchit nahin aur sabase oopar ladakee ka samajhadaar sahanasheel hona bahut jarooree hai
kyonki beemaaree ka kya kahana kabhee kuchh na hote hue bhee aa gheratee hai
aur dev ke kes mein pahale kya tha aakhiree dam tak ilaaj to bavaaseer ka ho raha tha aur ant mein nikala kya baat adhooree chhod dee doktar gupta ne
ve sab vaastavik sthiti se to parichit the
vah to ham samajhate hain doktar
yaanee aapakee taraph se koee pareshaanee nahin hai ramesh ne poochha
ab tak kee prograis to yahee kahatee hai ki dev ab tandurust rahega
shesh kab kya ho koee nahin jaanata
phir kuchh ruk kar kaha meree shubhakaamanaen aapake saath hain dev shaadee mein mujhe jaroor bulaana  doktar nijee baaton ke lie shaayad isase adhik samay nahin de sakata tha
isake lie yah ishaara kaaphee tha
dev va ramesh kumaar ne bhee baareebaaree haath mila kar unase vida lee
baahar nikalate hue doktar gupta ko laga ki aate hue dev ka chehara jitana chupachup tha jaate hue utana hee khil sa gaya hai
shaayad apanee shaadee kee baat sunakar
isase adhik nahin socha doktar gupta ne
intarakaam ka batan dabaakar nars ko doosara mareej bhejane ko kah diya
aur svayan saamane pade kaagaj ko dekhane mein talleen ho gae
